page.title: 07THE WEEKEND
page.content: On Friday night I come home,play then take the dog for a little walk.Later on I come in and watch tv.About 9.30 I go to bed.Next day my dad goes to work at the garage.I get up, listen to my radio then go outside.Later I go to the VG shop with my mum who buys some food and sweets.Then she phones Grand -ma.Afterwards I go in and watch tv. Then I go up to the windmill to play football with my brother.Later I go up to the garage into the office and then I go into the cars which are on sale. When we come back we have dinner.Later we watch a video film or tv.Next day I have a lie in and my dad goes to work.I go out and take my dog for a walk.At 1 o'clock we have turkey roast potatoes for dinner.After dinner we go up to the garage and put the cars away.When we get back I play out, walk the dog then get ready for bed.
